Description_lang: Frozen Orb makes Blizzard instant cast and increases its damage done by $270232s2% for $270232d.

description_blz.en_US: Frozen Orb makes Blizzard instant cast and increases its damage done by 60% for 12 sec.
description_blz.es_MX: Orbe congelado hace que Ventisca se lance inmediatamente, y aumenta el daño que inflige un 60% durante 12 s.
description_blz.pt_BR: Orbe Congelado faz com que a Nevasca seja instantânea e aumenta em 60% o dano que ela causa por 12 s.
description_blz.de_DE: Durch 'Gefrorene Kugel' wird 'Blizzard' zu einem Spontanzauber und sein verursachter Schaden wird um 60% erhöht. Hält 12 Sek. lang an.
description_blz.en_GB: Frozen Orb makes Blizzard instant cast and increases its damage done by 60% for 12 sec.
description_blz.es_ES: Orbe congelado hace que Ventisca sea de lanzamiento instantáneo y aumenta el daño que inflige un 60% durante 12 s.
description_blz.fr_FR: Orbe gelé vous permet de lancer instantanément Blizzard et augmente ses dégâts de 60% pendant 12 s.
description_blz.it_IT: Globo Congelato rende il lancio di Tormenta istantaneo e ne aumenta i danni inflitti del 60% per 12 s.
description_blz.ru_RU: "Ледяной шар" делает применение "Снежной бури" мгновенным и увеличивает наносимый ею урон на 60% на 12 сек.
description_blz.ko_KR: 얼어붙은 구슬 시전 시 12초 동안 공격력이 60%만큼 증가한 눈보라를 즉시 시전할 수 있게 됩니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 冰霜之球使暴風雪變成瞬發法術，並且使其造成的傷害提高60%，持續12秒。
description_blz.zh_CN: 寒冰宝珠使暴风雪变为瞬发，并且造成的伤害提高60%，持续12秒。
